An aspring Software Engineer and open-source lover. In the past, I worked as a Software Developer at Brainstorm Force. I have experience working on WordPress.

I am a fun-loving, goal-oriented, optimistic personality. I believe success lies on the line joining technical skills & non-technical skills too. Being said that, I am myself a blend of the two things. Ideas + innovation ðŸ‘€ + technology + leadership + commitment are my tag words for life. An avid reader & definitely not a quitter.
